CustomField.formula: IF( AND( MONTH( Date_Enquired__c ) = 2, DAY( Date_Enquired__c ) = 29, NOT( OR( MOD( YEAR( Date_Enquired__c ), 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( Date_Enquired__c ), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( Date_Enquired__c ), 100 ) != 0 ) ) ) ), DATE( YEAR( Date_Enquired__c ) + 1, 3, 1), DATE( YEAR( Date_Enquired__c ) + 1, MONTH( Date_Enquired__c ), DAY( Date_Enquired__c )) )
CustomField.label: 1 year on Date Enquired
